jathika godanagili paryeshana aayathanaya nayayame awadanama gana kalthiya ema janayata anathuru angawamin ema sthanawalin iwathwa yana lesa ki namuth boho aya ema anathuru angawima “nothaka harima” magin wyasanayata goduruwu bawa amarawira kiwe ya.

ee anuwa lankawata ji.es.pi plas badu sahanaya labi, eya ahimi wi giye siwil saha deshapalana ayithiwasikam pilibanda sammuthiyata lankawa athsan thaba, eewa kriyathmaka kirimedi dakwu pragathiya ha aduluhudukam wartha kirimedi anugamanaya kala kriya patipatiya salaka balimen anathuruwaya.

me deka athara thaththwaya tishu eka matha pawathi nam samanya samak lesath pahasuwen apata handunagatha hakiya.

20 wana aandukrama wyawastha panath ketumpathata adalawa sabhapathi kanchana jayarathna mahatha wisin mehidi chanda wimasimak sidu karanu labiya.

aාnduwata banina minissu kalakanni nam mamath ee kalakanningen eekkenek thamayi.baninawa kiwwata eeka banillak neaweyi,owun karana waradi de wiwechanaya kirimak.ada ape aාnduwa madhyama radayakin kalayuthu kriya waliyen baharawa nagarasabha walin , pradeshiya sabha walin kalayuthu deth karamin lea්keta naya wewi thama sakku purawa ganimin sitiyi.rajayak wisin pradhana washayenma kala yuththe rakiya awastha bihikirimath (rajaye rakiya dima neawe)adhyapanaya , serukhyaya wani subasadhana katayuthu kirimath , maha marga ,widulibalaya ,aාdi yatithala pahasukam sapayimath paripalanamaya katayuthu saha jathika aාrakshawa thahawuru kirimathya.rakiya awastha bihikirimdi yahapath mulya paripalanayak saha baranku aැthulu perugalika wyawasayakayin diriganwana wada piliwelak anugamanaya kalayuthuya.marga paddhathiya kapat kalata uyan wathu aැthikalata rata diyunu wenne natha.ee sadaha rate bhanda ha sewa nishpadanaya ihala damiya yuthuya.eewani digukalina sanwadhana wadapiliwelak me rajaye dakinnata natha.eehi anitu prathiwipaka obata thawama neadanunath rate dilidu janathawata eeya danemin pawathi.rajayata baninne mema thathwaya awabea්dhakaragath manasunya.mewani keti kament eekakin sampurna pahadili kirimak kala neahaki athara sathyaya awabea්dha karaganimata obata hakiwewayi prarthanaya karami.

ee nisa, meya mona widihakinwath, aluth aandukrama wyawasthawak sandaha wana awasana liyawillak ho ketumpathak ho nowana bawa sihiye thaba gatha yuthuya.
